point-of-interest.description: Home of mountain orcs, mountain dwarves and duergars. Prepare well before entering this keep.

point-of-interest.description: The huge tunnel system between Ados mountains and Amazon is quite confusing when you try to find the correct exit. Maybe you will be stranded somewhere... (Player Level 50 - 200)

Do you want to sell some shields for a good price? Visit me on the market, I'm always around! - Alexander -

Hello and welcome to #Ados #Market! You can find nice offers here! Visit #Alexander (walking salesman), #Haunchy #Meatoch (west), #Uncle #Dag (next to the path), #Adena (in the north west) and #Florence #Boullabaisse (in the north east) at their market stands. - Market Supervisor -

Hello and welcome to #Ados #Market! You can find nice offers here! Visit #Alexander (walking salesman), #Haunchy #Meatoch (west), #Uncle #Dag (next to the path), #Adena (in the north west) and #Florence #Boullabaisse (in the north east) at their market stands. - Market Supervisor -
Are you interested in an excellent beverage? Ask me for my offers! - Uncle Dag -
Can you smell the BBQ already? Visit me at the west side of the market! - Haunchy Meatoch -
Fresh vegetables available from farms near Semos! Come to the north and visit my market stand! - Adena -
Are you hungry? I can cook a lovely fish soup for you. Visit me at the east side of the market! - Florence Boullabaisse -
This chestnut tree originally grew near Semos, and is over 100 years old.
This display of perennial flowers includes hydrangea, marigolds, forget-me-not and daisies. They commonly flower in Semos near Easter.
This area showcases plants from around Faiumoni, some of which would not grow naturally near Ados, and need special care.
Palm trees and banana trees are native to Athor Island. The pineapple plants are a specimen collected from an unknown island on an exploratory boat trip.
Typical bushes and shrubs which grow commonly on the mainland, including some native to Ados and Semos.
This pink bush was grown from a seedling collected near Fado Forest many years ago. The original plant was believed to have magical powers, but is not found today. This could be the last specimen.
This tree is thought to be a descendant from the tree which famously helped Nuetonn work out his theory of gravity.
An experiment to grow a garden with minimal watering. Clean water could become a scarce resource if not managed carefully. These plants can survive in dry conditions.
Orchard trees such as those found near Semos. The pear tree is very rare, and this one does not bear fruit.
Formal arrangement of bulbs and foxgloves surrounding a special golden tree. These rare trees are sometimes believed to have mystical significance due to their striking golden colour.
A locust tree of unknown origin. Believed to be grown from a cutting collected on an exploratory survey of distant mountains, but the records for this have been lost.
This formal garden is a smaller version of the formal garden in Kalavan's famous city gardens. The city gardener, Sue, curated this piece for Ados Botanical Gardens.
Greenhouses are used to provide a warmer environment for plants and allow a greater control of their growth. The greenhouse is currently closed to visitors.
This area is designed to promote quiet meditation. The flowers used outside the gazebo have a calming smell, and standing inside the gazebo you can appreciate a moment of peace.

implementation.parameter: Buy premium imported drinks and snacks here!

point-of-interest.name: Ados Caves Northwest Entrance
point-of-interest.title: Ados Caves
point-of-interest.description: The Ados Caves are built up from lots of smaller caves and tunnels. There are many different creatures running around which guard the paths. The northern region can be passed by lower leveled players with caution! (Player Level 80 - 597)

point-of-interest.name: Ados Caves Naga Hole
point-of-interest.description: You hear very loud hissing from the hole in the ground. There must be some gigantic snakes within.

entity.attribute: Summon scrolls will immediately summon a creature that will attack your foes. Strong magicians are able to summon strong and dangerous creatures. Therefore, some cities, such as Semos, have forbidden the usage of these scrolls in their areas.

point-of-interest.name: Outside Ados
point-of-interest.description: The Dungeon of Outside Ados can be found close to the Ados Mountains in the west of Ados. The entrance is laying close to the Ados Wildlife Refuge home for endangered animals.

entity.attribute: Ados Wildlife Refuge Home for endangered animals

implementation.parameter: Restricted access: animal keepers and vets only.

implementation.parameter: You were about to walk down the stairs when someone or something held you back, whispering 'Beware the giant spider, for you are too weak!'

entity.attribute: FISHING SPOTS IN FAIUMONI The best spot to fish for cod is in Ados, as this species lives in the sea. Trout live in rivers. There is an excellent fishing spot near Fado. Perch reside in rivers and lakes, too. Brave fishermen tell of big catches in the area where the elves dwell. Mackerel can only be fished at the open sea. More exotic fish are found on the island Athor. In a mountain lake near Ados is a spot where char fish are very easy to find. In Semos there is a lake which is rich in roaches.

THE DIVER'S HANDBOOK by N Moe Decompression Sickness - When nitrogen bubbles block blood flow in your body after a dive. It's not pleasant. Did you know that only 21 precent of the air we breath is oxygen? Most scuba diving injuries caused by fish and aquatic animals happen because they are afraid of you. You should never dive with a cold or severe allergy because, you may not be able to equalize pressure.
...Beauty is nothing other than the promise of happiness...
...One can acquire everything in solitude - except character...

entity.attribute: The rules and statutes of Marriage and Divorce throughout the island of Faiumoni are complex and require much ...
So Billy and Betty were very tired at the end of their long day, and they went to sleep dreaming of castles and drawbridges.
The next day Billy and Betty's mother said they must stay indoors and help her wash sheets, they were very disappointed not to be able to visit the castle again.

To make 1 sausage:
1 meat 1 bat entrails 1 vampirette entrails
My fee:
2 wine (for me and the old lady)

To make 1 cheese sausage:
1 cheese 1 chicken 1 bat entrails 1 vampirette entrails
My fee:
1 black pearl (to make necklace for the little woman)

To make 1 canned tuna:
1 perch 1 mackerel
My fee:
2 marbles (for my daughter)

point-of-interest.name: Assassin Tunnel
point-of-interest.description: The Assassin Tunnel is populated by young, strong assassins, some of whom are trainees who wait for huge tasks which they alone can solve. Other occupants include a group of Blordrough deserters, along with their beloved dragons. (Player Level 60 - 200)

implementation.parameter: A protective aura prevents you from going any lower.
A protective aura prevents you from going any lower.
You see a hole leading downward but there does not appear to be a way back up.
Odds and ends bought here from anyone who will sell.

entity.attribute: You see a beautiful piano. Perhaps you could play it.

You see a piece of paper with writing on it: I have found some water but fear I am trapped. I have yet to find any food and the creature that chased me here is waiting if I go back the way I came. I have lost my journal and this is my only parchment left. I can feel a weak wind on my face. Perhaps an exit is in this area.

You see a torn page from what looks to be a journal: ...ve attempted to cast a barrier on the hole that led me down to this lower level. But my magic abilities are weak. Hopefully it will prevent adventurers who are too weak from entering.

The journal of Zephiros the explorer: It has been three days since I decided to explore the lower levels of the caves and I have yet to find an exit. How I wish I could reach the water source on the upper level. I can hear the nagas in the darkness. I can hardly stand their screaming any longer. May the gods have mercy on me and any who may dare to follow my footsteps.

implementation.parameter: You can buy excellent quality weapons and armor here.
